title: Swaraj Abhiyan:  Aam Aadmi Party's Former Leaders Set Their Sights on Delhi's Municipal Elections
content:
Yogendra Yadav and Prashant Bhushan, expelled Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leaders, are making their political comeback. Their political outfit, Swaraj Abhiyan, has established a strong presence in Delhi, opening 100 offices, with their eyes set on the Municipal Council of Delhi (MCD) elections.

This move marks a direct challenge to their former party, AAP, who are aiming to snatch MCD seats from the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). Swaraj Abhiyan is hoping to build a strong support base in Delhi, promising to address citizens' concerns. 

While their entry into Punjab elections next year remains unconfirmed, their growing influence in Delhi's political landscape is undeniable.
author: Scroll Staff
